title: Bug 10022 - Incorrect 'Build' Popup Action Enablement
description: This bug report pertains to the behavior of the 'Build' action in the context-sensitive popup menu within the Java perspective.
OB: The bug report lacks a clear description of the observed behavior and expected behavior.
EB: The expected behavior mentioned is 'No need for a manual build if the build is already done, automatically.'
SR: The steps to reproduce provided are: 'If 'Build' action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled.' This statement is not a complete set of steps and does not provide clear instructions for reproducing the issue.
